import {Pokemon} from "../model/Pokemon"; import * as React from "react"; import {Modal} from "react-bootstrap"; interface IProps { pokemonList: Pokemon[] } export function PokemonList(props: IProps) { const [show, setShow] = React.useState(false); return ( <> setShow(false)}> Modal heading Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal! {props.pokemonList.map(pokemon => ( <> ))}
# Name Types setShow(true)}>Weight
{pokemon.id} {pokemon.name} {pokemon.types.map(t => t.name).join(" ")} {pokemon.weight}
) }
